content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: glass_bottle
inventory=[{"type": "scute", "quantity": 52, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 19, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 48, "index": 24}, {"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 38, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 52, "index": 30}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 27, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a glass_bottle I need to place glass blocks in the shape of a capital 'V'. I have 3 glass blocks in slot 22, so I will first move one to slot 1.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: glass_bottle
inventory=[{"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 52, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 19, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 48, "index": 24}, {"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 38, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 52, "index": 30}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 27, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}]
thought: To complete the 'V' shape I need to place another glass block to the right of the one already placed in slot 1. Therefore I will move another glass block from slot 22 to slot 3.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: glass_bottle
inventory=[{"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 52, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 19, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 48, "index": 24}, {"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 38, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 52, "index": 30}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 27, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}]
thought: The final piece of the 'V' shape is the bottom of the 'V', which is slot 5. I will move my last glass block from slot 22 to slot 5.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: glass_bottle
inventory=[{"type": "glass_bottle", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 52, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 19, "index": 23}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 48, "index": 24}, {"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 38, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 52, "index": 30}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 27, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that I have crafted 3 glass bottles, I will move them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 3
